feed.title: Algonquin Park (Lake of Two Rivers) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Algonquin Park (Lake of Two Rivers)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:13 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 2:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
Temperature: 1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 38 %
Dewpoint: -10.9°C
Wind: N 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Clearing this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the morning then snow. Blowing snow early in the afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
